# Next.js Personal Portfolio Website

## Project Type

- Next.js application with TypeScript
- React 18+
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- shadcn/ui component library

## Design Patterns

- App Router (Next.js 13+ convention)
- Server and Client Components
- Responsive design mobile-first approach

## Coding Conventions

- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Use functional components with hooks
- Follow Next.js best practices for file structure
- Use Tailwind CSS utility classes for styling
- Leverage shadcn/ui components for UI elements

## Project Structure

- `/app` - Next.js app router pages and layouts
- `/components` - Reusable React components
- `/public` - Static assets (images, fonts, etc.)
- `/lib` - Utility functions and helpers

## Key Features

- Hero section with profile image placeholder
- About/Resume section with bio placeholder
- Projects showcase with link placeholders
- Responsive navigation
- Modern, clean design
